title: [Large-Scale] Systematic Evaluation Model Application for Real-Time Online Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and general understanding of language learning
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive real-time online language program in a smartphone-centric constrained technology environment, requiring formative assessment-driven monitoring of learning outcomes and satisfaction

learning_goals: Learners can explain the four stages (planning-development-process-results evaluation) of the PDPP assessment model.
Learners can participate in formative assessments during real-time online classes via smartphones with over 80% engagement.
Learners can apply assessment models in the language learning process to establish self-directed study plans.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
